name: All Eyes On Me (emjay, Olima, Crash Forward)
name_original: All Eyes On Me (emjay, Olima, Crash Forward)
description:
A short horror game

... alone in the woods

... keep going

... and whatever you do 

.... DON'T LOOK AT THEM

############

Controls 

[MOUSE/TRACKPAD] - Look around
[WASD] Move
[N] - Decrease mouse speed
[M] - Increase mouse speed

############

by

Moritz Jäger / @jaegermoritz

Created in a weekend for Ludum Dare Theme:
